official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of May 16, 1976, as National Handicapped Awareness Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the week of May 16, 1976, as "National Handicapped Awareness Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of May 16, 1976, as National Handicapped Awareness Week.
